title.narrative: Support to Public Authority of Manpower

description.narrative: PAM is partnering with UNDP, IOM& ILO to improve the labor conditions. This prog aims to support PAM to develop internal capacity in reporting on its own performance, on labor movement & on compliance with int'l labor standards.

title.narrative: Support to Public Authority of Manpower

description.narrative: PAM plans to improve the labour conditions and management system by analysing the demographic imbalance, making sound decision based on enhanced reporting mechanisms and upgrading its services quality for all economic and social actors.

The ICDI/KNDP project seeks to provide a framework of technical support to GSSCPD and CSB and other public entities to create an enabling environment for implementation, monitoring and evaluation and ultimately delivery of KNDP results.

title.narrative: Achieving Kuwait 2035 Vision Towards Persons with Disabi

description.narrative: The project will provide technical assistance and build capacities of the Public Authority for Disabled Affairs (PADA), as part of its Strategic Plan to assist persons with disabilities to access appropriate resources to become active partners in society

title.narrative: Support to Public Authority for Sport

description.narrative: The project will support the implementation of Kuwait’s sports development plan & to support the Public Authority for Sport (PAS) to provide the proper grounds to develop youth socially, emotionally & physically, by providing sports for all ages.

title.narrative: Kuwait Public Policy Centre Establishment Support

description.narrative: UNDP will collaborate closely with GSSCPD to support the establishment of a pioneer Kuwait Public Policy Centre (KPPC) to address policy making gaps and mainstream policy research, analysis and studies in the policy making process.

UNDP will collaborate closely with GSSCPD to support the establishment of a pioneer Kuwait Public Policy Centre (KPPC) to address policy making gaps and mainstream policy research, analysis and studies in the policy making process.

The HDR 2016 project will be produced around a specific theme based on a selected priority development challenge in the country that would help achieve as well as lead to higher awareness and understanding about human development.
